scripts.deploy: forge build && forge create --rpc-url localhost:8545 --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) src/Royale.sol:Royale --constructor-args $(grep TESTER1 .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.creategame: cast send $(grep ROYALE .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) 'createGame(uint256)' 1ether --value 1ether
scripts.creategame2: cast send $(grep ROYALE .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep KEY2 .env | cut -d '=' -f2) 'createGame(uint256)' 1ether --value 1ether
scripts.deploy-create: pnpm run deploy && pnpm run creategame
scripts.joingame: cast send $(grep ROYALE .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep KEY2 .env | cut -d '=' -f2) 'joinGame(uint256)'
scripts.startgame: cast send $(grep ROYALE .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) 'startGame(uint256)'
scripts.setready1: cast send $(grep ROYALE .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep PRIVATE_KEY .env | cut -d '=' -f2) 'setReady(uint256 , address , bool)'
scripts.setready2: cast send $(grep ROYALE .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --private-key $(grep KEY2 .env | cut -d '=' -f2) 'setReady(uint256 , address , bool)'
